meanings.definition: A flat, thin piece of metal or other material with an inscription or design, typically attached to a wall or other surface.
meanings.sent1: The golden plaque on the classroom wall honored the best student.
meanings.sent2: The historical plaque on the building described its significance.
meanings.sent3: The plaque on the door jokingly read 'Beware of the cat'.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a plaque, shining brightly for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The plaque on the trophy made it a cherished keepsake.

meanings.definition: A sticky film of bacteria that forms on teeth and can lead to tooth decay.
meanings.sent1: The dentist removed the plaque from my teeth during the cleaning.
meanings.sent2: Brushing and flossing regularly helps prevent plaque buildup.
meanings.sent3: The plaque on my teeth seemed to have a party, inviting all the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The plaque on the teeth was a silent enemy, slowly causing damage.
meanings.sent5: The dentist showed me how to remove plaque effectively for good oral health.
